Name: Fireball
Description: Hit enemy with sphere of fire

Name: Ice Shard
Description: Throw ice shard that deals damage and stops enemy movement

Name: Lighting Strike
Description: Summon lighting strike that breaks enemy defense and deal lot of damage

Name: Inferno
Description: Create fire field under enemy that deals him very high damage.

Name: Renewal Fountain
Description: Create spring that recovers your health

Name: Magnetic Shield
Description: Create magnetic barrier in front of you that protect you from enemy attacks

Name: Death Breath
Description: Corrupt air around your enemy to deal him damage

Name: Terror
Description: Fears your enemy, breaks his charge attack and deals damage

Name: Evil Blood
Description: Curse enemy's blood to deal damage

Name: Deadly Shroud
Description: Summon Shroud of Death that deals a lot of damage to your foe.

Name: Blood Ritual
Description: Perform Ritual that steals some health from your enemy and recovers yours.

Name: Phantom Shield
Description: Arise phantom shield that protects you.
